password-min-length: Password must be at least 8 characters
not-found-subtitle: Sorry, the page you visited does not exist.
help-intro: Welcome to the Learnify Help Center. Find answers to common questions about accounts, courses, and more below.
create-account: To start learning, create an account by clicking "Sign Up" at the top-right corner. Choose your role as Student or Teacher.
login-account: If you already have an account, click "Login" and enter your registered email and password.
update-full-name: You can update your Full Name and other profile details in the User Settings area by clicking on your profile icon.
change-password: To change your password, navigate to User Settings, select "Edit Profile", and follow the prompts to update your password securely.
enroll-course: To enroll in a course, navigate to the Courses page, select the course you are interested in, and click the "Join Course" button.
teacher-dashboard: Teachers can manage their content from the Teacher Dashboard. This includes creating chapters, adding exams, and tracking student progress.
student-dashboard: Students can access their active courses in the My Courses section, view course chapters, and monitor their learning progress.
exams-and-quizzes: Exams and quizzes are typically found at the end of course chapters. Completing them is essential for tracking progress and receiving final scores.
support-details: If you require further assistance or encounter technical issues, please contact our support team via the "Contact Us" page linked in the footer.
course-overview-text: In this course, you will learn the core concepts of JavaScript, how to structure code efficiently, and how to build dynamic front-end experiences. Each chapter includes exercises, quizzes, and real-world examples.
